catalog_script_client.name: Date Validation

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_e25b3a839733211042e53e2e6253afb6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Loaner Vehicle">fba7fd2997b3211042e53e2e6253afb9</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Date Validation</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var dateNeeded = g_form.getValue('date_needed');
    var dateToReturn = g_form.getValue('date_to_return');

    //If date return is before date needed trigger error message
    if (dateToReturn && dateNeeded && dateToReturn < dateNeeded) {
        g_form.addErrorMessage('Date to return should not be before the Date needed');
        g_form.clearValue('date_to_return');
        return false; // Prevent form submission
    }
    return true; // Allow form submission
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-07 19:22:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e25b3a839733211042e53e2e6253afb6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Date Validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_919571_lva">2fca864d976b611042e53e2e6253af21</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">2fca864d976b611042e53e2e6253af21</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e25b3a839733211042e53e2e6253afb6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-07 19:44:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
